answers.answer: Hi!If your first pregnancy did not make it past 16 weeks, and you are cramping and spotting, you need to immediately consult your Obs and Gyn to rule out threatened abortion. Generally first trimester abortions or abortions occurring in first three months are due to fetal abnormality, genetic causes, Rh blood group incompatibility and low progesterone hormone. Infection of the uterus, endometriosis, fibroids, etc  are some other causes for early abortion.You must also investigate the causes of abortion in second trimester like chromosomal abnormalities; infections like listeria, rickettsia, toxoplasma, mycoplasma, viral infections (herpes, rubella, CMV, HbAv), local infections (cervicitis, endometritis) and malaria; cervical dilatation; multiple pregnancies; leiomyomas, fibroids and anomalies of uterus; diabetes; hypertension; smoking; renal diseases; polycystic ovary; hormonal disturbances; and in some cases the cause is not known.Please consult your Obs and Gyn immediately. It could be  afalse alarm, maybe just gas, but this needs to be ruled out! Take care!

question: I get sharp to moderate pain sometimes on my sides of my stomach. My back aches at times to. When i rub my stomach it feels better some times. My stomach hurts when i need to pee at times. im 10 weeks and 1 day pregnant. Plus i been still spotting since Sept 9th. please help, is this normal? Could this be just changes in the body or ? I'd hate to think the worst. cause this is my second pregnany and the first pregnany didnt make it pass 16 weeks. So im looking for answers so please help me.
title: Feels like cramping plz help
